trans-unit.source:
thank you for your message. We will contact you as soon as possible.
Enclosed you will find your message sent to us.
The following message was sent via the contact form on our website:
This email uses a customized Fluid template and layout.

For the Fluid template (.html/.txt), the default file name "Default" ist used. The Fluid layout has the self-selected name "FormEmail" (.html/.txt) which is assigned with the <f:layout> ViewHelper in the Fluid template.

All files have custom names: "CustomReceiverTemplate" (.html/.txt) for the Fluid template; "CustomReceiverLayout" (.html/.txt) for the Fluid layout. The file names are assigned manually: "CustomReceiverTemplate" in the Email finisher (form definition). The "CustomReceiverLayout" in the <f:layout> ViewHelper of the Fluid template.
